replies.msg:
Ouestion: We have developed into a “throw-away society” and are filling up our environment with plastic bags and rubbish that we cannot fully dispose of. What are the causes of this phenomenon and recommend some measures to reduce this problem.

Answer:
Due to technology development, more and more non-biodegradable waste is generated, and it causes numerous problems such as the shortage of landfills, water pollution and ecological disasters around the world. In order to effectively reduce litter, I am going to discuss the root of the production of waste and figure out possible solutions to tackle the current situation.

The reason of people using plastic products is due to the sense of convenience. For example, when you order a takeaway, restaurants will serve customers with plastic cutlery which is for one-time use. People have a choice to decline the restaurants’ service but many still want to acquire a set of tableware because they can save time on wishing their used cutlery. This passive attitude toward using non-recycle plastic goods is contributed to create immeasurable rubbish.

The other reason of increasing waste in the modern society is due to packing culture. A delicately packed products always have better sales than unpacked one. Therefore, companies will make attractive appearance for their commercial goods out of extra wrapping papers and containers. At the end, the packing culture encourages manufacturers to increasingly produce more litter.

In order to address above issues, there are several methods being considered. First, nowadays, scientists have invented bio-degradable materials to replace the plastic bags. The government can encourage the manufacturers to change their original practices and can set up taxes for selling plastic products. Second, people are able to relieve the environmental problem that they can try to use recycle bags and cutlery rather than the non-recycle. Changing their behavior in daily, it will be an essential action to reduce the creation of litter. In the end, green non-governmental organization can introduce correct knowledge of handling recyclable materials like metals, papers and plastics. If all the parties work together, the amount of waste will be effectively reduced.

試下睇多啲範文，學下佢地寫法

6.5應該都ok嘅，唔算太差，但有好多改善空間

A ... products呢啲明顯嘅錯小心啲proofread都會發現到，grammar係基本，唔喺度一一詳列錯嘅位

另外一啲係啲無咁明顯嘅問題，比如"the reason ... is due to..."其實係語意重覆，一係用due to去講原因，一係用the reason is that...，唔會一齊用

另一句印象深刻啲嘅係"when you buy... the restaurants will give the customers..."
咁上下嘅句子，其實係唔合邏輯，你買嘢餐廳比餐具嘅對象自然係你，而唔係customers

仲有就係好多句子都比較累贅，可以嘗試用短啲嘅方式去表達同一個意思

小心啲proofread可以去除唔少沙石，加油
